original.html:
<button class="cursor-pointer flex justify-between bg-gray-800 px-3 py-2 rounded-full text-white tracking-wider shadow-xl hover:bg-gray-900 hover:scale-105 duration-500 hover:ring-1 font-mono w-[150px]">
  Resume
  <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="2" stroke="currentColor" class="w-5 h-5 animate-bounce">
    <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M19.5 13.5 12 21m0 0-7.5-7.5M12 21V3"></path>
  </svg>
</button>

uniapp.template:
<button class="cursor-pointer flex justify-between bg-gray-800 px-3 py-2 rounded-full text-white tracking-wider shadow-xl hover:bg-gray-900 hover:scale-105 duration-500 hover:ring-1 font-mono w-[150px]"></button>
  Resume
  <view xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="2" stroke="currentColor" class="w-5 h-5 animate-bounce"></view>
    <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M19.5 13.5 12 21m0 0-7.5-7.5M12 21V3"></path>
  </svg>
</button>
